TopicTitle: [Solved] How to mark own post as "Solved"

Articles.Content: I don't find the way to mark them, i googled it but didnt find any suitable way neither!

You can edit the title.

You can report your own post to a moderator and request the thread to be closed.

This forum doesn't have this specific feature enabled.

Moved to Kerbal Network, since it's about the forum.

The best way would be to just edit the thread title and add something at the beginning, like [SOLVED].  Personally I think it's best to leave question threads unlocked even after they've been solved, because usually there can be further on-topic discussions about the question.
Thanks, for some posts, like this one :-D i think it is better to be "marked".
